guestModal.title: You have been invited as a collaborator
guestModal.text1: As a collaborator, you will be able to manage projects, access administrative tools, and work alongside the assigned team.
guestModal.text2: Please configure your account information and add a password

card1.text1: An environment designed for your operation
card1.text2: EncodeBiz brings together in a single environment the technology that makes your company run.
card1.text3: Clearer processes, connected data, and a digital foundation ready to grow with your services.

card2.text2: Before activating any of the encodeBiz services, we need to complete your entity's setup. This ensures that each module works with the correct data and is adapted to your organization.
card2.text3: Configuring your entity allows you to:
card2.text5: Apply your organization's corporate identity across all services and modules, ensuring a consistent experience for your team.
card2.text7: Unify your entity's key data so it's available in documents, processes, reports, and configurations of each service you activate.
card2.text9: Comply with legal and data protection requirements, ensuring that each service operates transparently and in accordance with regulations.

card3.text4: The system for issuing and managing digital credentials and access in a unified environment.
card3.text5: It will allow creating credentials, managing access, and controlling events with security and immediate digital validation.
card3.text8: Issue digital credentials for employees, students, or clients.
card3.text9: Create and manage events with passes for attendees and staff.
card3.text12: The solution that analyzes and structures the real work behavior of your teams.
card3.text13: It obtains workday records, validates them with operational context, and generates clear traceability to support real-time decisions.
card3.text16: Register workdays with geolocation and validate their context.
card3.text17: Understand work patterns and team dynamics.
card3.text18: Visualize teams, projects, and schedules with real structure.
card3.text19: Generate actionable reports and data in real time.

stats.passesIssuedText: Distribution of issued passes in stacked bars by event or credential
stats.passesValidation: Validation: Attempts vs Successes vs Revoked Passes
stats.passesValidationText: Distribution of valid, failed, and revoked passes in stacked bars by event or credential
stats.empthytext: Adjust the filters with the parameters you need to graph information

statsCheckbiz.advise: You must select at least one branch/project to see statistics.
statsCheckbiz.loading: Processing and preparing data to display
statsCheckbiz.avgWeekWorkHelp: Average start and end time of workday (in decimal format)
statsCheckbiz.avgStartEndHelp: Average start and end time of workday (in decimal format)
statsCheckbiz.avgCostHourHelp: Average cost per hour calculated via EMA (heuristic smoothed)
statsCheckbiz.avgCostEfficiencyHelp: Relationship between cost and productivity (higher = more efficient)
statsCheckbiz.avgCycleCostHelp: Average cost per production or activity cycle

weeklyTrends.title: Weekly trends
weeklyTrends.subtitle: Cost, hours and suspects per week

employeeDashboard.emptyPattern: No attendance patterns available to display in the employee profile
employeeDashboard.dispertionText: Weekly dispersion comparison, shows the real variability level in the employee's entry and exit times throughout the week.
employeeDashboard.hourOperationText1: Data showing how the employee works in terms of schedules, workload, and consistency of their records.
employeeDashboard.hourOperationText2: Helps understand their operational stability, actual use of their time, and reliability of the information recorded in their workdays.
employeeDashboard.ruleText: Automatic diagnosis that interprets the worker's actual behavior and generates clear conclusions about their performance, stability, and potential within the team. Allows identifying talent, operational risks, and improvement opportunities based on objective data.
employeeDashboard.tempActivity11: Daily variation of the average start time of the workday.
employeeDashboard.tempActivity22: Daily variation of the average end time of the workday.
employeeDashboard.tempActivity33: Daily evolution of the average total hours worked.
employeeDashboard.stabilityDesc: Habitual start and end time according to the branch's real behavior. The system analyzes complete workdays and obtains a stable time pattern.
employeeDashboard.weeklyHoursDesc: Number of hours worked per week. Values are based on the real weekly operation trend.
employeeDashboard.hourDispersionDesc: Average hourly dispersion of employee entry and exit to measure punctuality, reliability, and consistency.
employeeDashboard.costHourDesc: Average cost associated with each effective hour of actual activity.
employeeDashboard.costCycleDesc: Approximate cost of a full day of activity, according to the branch's real behavior.
employeeDashboard.costEffectiveDesc: Standard measure that summarizes the stability and efficiency of the real workday. Allows comparing branches based on how they function, regardless of their activity.
employeeDashboard.costEfficiencyDesc: Measures how the invested money performs considering the time pattern, regularity, and stability. A high value indicates good operational utilization of the cost.
employeeDashboard.totalCostDesc: Total estimated cost generated by the analyzed workdays, considering time pattern, regularity, and stability of the behavior.
employeeDashboard.confidenceDesc: Pattern reliability level based on the amount and consistency of analyzed data.
employeeDashboard.observationsDesc: Number of valid workdays used to build the operational trend.
employeeDashboard.tempActivity1Desc: Average time at which workdays usually begin. Reflects the habitual start behavior over time.
employeeDashboard.tempActivity2Desc: Average time at which workdays usually end. Shows the general trend of workday closure.
employeeDashboard.tempActivity3Desc: Average number of effective hours performed per workday. Allows seeing if the daily workload is stable or shows variations.
employeeDashboard.heuristicText1: Indicators showing how the branch functions in terms of schedules, costs, and data quality.
employeeDashboard.heuristicText2: Allows understanding operational stability, actual resource use, and reliability of recorded information.
employeeDashboard.hourText: Comparison of time behavior between branches/projects. Values are normalized on a 0–100 scale, where higher values indicate greater operational stability, better time organization, and more consistent hour distribution.
employeeDashboard.dataConfiabilityText: Comparison of operational data quality and stability between branches/projects. Values are normalized on a 0–100 scale, where higher values indicate greater consistency, less variability, and more reliable data for decision-making.
employeeDashboard.costsText1: Comparison of economic performance between branches/projects.
employeeDashboard.costsText2: Values are normalized on a 0–100 scale, where higher scores represent more efficient resource use, lower deviations, and a better cost-productivity balance.
employeeDashboard.emptyBranch: You must select at least one branch/project to see statistics.
employeeDashboard.helpPanelEmpty: Currently there is not enough operational information generated to display in the comparative dashboard. Once the selected branches/projects begin recording attendance and operational data, you will be able to view detailed and comparative analysis here.
employeeDashboard.panelNoDataText: This view allows comparing operational, temporal, and heuristic behavior between different branches or projects. Once there is sufficient activity, you will be able to select which branch or project you want to contrast and which indicators to visualize. Until then, comparisons are not possible.
employeeDashboard.employeeNoDataText: Create your first employee to start organizing your operation. From here you can manage their basic information and assign them to a branch or project. Once created, this section will display the complete list of your team.
employeeDashboard.reportNoDataTitle: No data to generate a report
employeeDashboard.reportNoDataText: Select the branch/project and a date range to obtain a downloadable report. Generation will only be available when there are enough attendance records within the chosen period. Until then, reports cannot be produced.
employeeDashboard.attendanceNoDataText: Here, entries and exits linked to each employee and branch/project will be displayed, along with location and schedule validation. Once the first clock-ins are recorded, you will be able to supervise daily activity and filter by dates, employee, and branch or project.

checking.title: Attendance Control
checking.outRadiusText: It seems you are not within the check-in zone. To perform operations with this tool, you must be near the branch or project.
checking.noGeoText: It seems you do not have the geolocation permission enabled. Enable it to use this tool

twoFactor.step1Text2: You can use Google Authenticator, Microsoft Authenticator, Duo, Authy, or another compatible app.
twoFactor.step1Title1: Open your authentication app and choose
twoFactor.step2Text1: Write the 6-digit code shown by your authentication app.
twoFactor.step3Title1: Step 1: Copy and paste this key
twoFactor.step3Text1: Paste the key below into your authentication app, such as Google Authenticator, Microsoft Authenticator, Duo, Authy, or another compatible app.
twoFactor.step4Text1: Write the 6-digit code shown by your authentication app.
twoFactor.text1Validate: To add your browser as a trusted device, enter the 6-digit code shown by your authentication app.

error.unavailable: Service unavailable. Please try again later.
error.staff/email_already_exists: A support staff member with that email already exists.

error.staff/unauthorized: Support staff access disabled or expired
error.user/not_found: No user exists with that email

error.checklog/out_of_radius: You do not appear to be at the selected branch; you cannot start workday
error.stats/range_and_groupBy_tolong: Data to graph is too extensive. Try selecting a smaller date range or another grouping type.
